item.title: Need help with our Average View Duration - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone who really understands the quality of faceless Youtube videos as our videos are still getting low AVD % of like 25% average.

We tried changing clip selection and Voiceover but that still didn't improve.

We also tried improving our scripts, but still no improvement.

Would love to get some detailed feed-back on our 2 videos (about 10 mins per video), and see where the big problem is and what we can improve for our future videos.

Budget $20 for 2 videos feed-back.

Thanks

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 30, 2024 03:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Script
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Script
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Facebook and instgram ads + VSL editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to help us edit multiple video ads and edit our VSL. The ideal candidate should have experience in making video ads, especially for platforms like Facebook and instagram. Those are "Talking head" videos.

Project Details:
We have 4 groups of ads and a VSL.
Groups 1, 2, and 3 each have multiple hooks but share the same main part (body).
For example, Group 1 has 8 hooks, resulting in 8 different videos with different openings (hooks) but the same main content (body). The same applies to Groups 2 and 3.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw video footage into engaging video ads.
Add graphics, animations, and special effects.
Ensure the final videos fit our brand and marketing goals.
Manage multiple versions of videos and keep them consistent.

Requirements:

Experience in video editing, especially for ads.
Strong portfolio showing previous video ad work.
Great attention to detail and creativity.
Ability to meet deadlines.
Experience handling multiple video versions.

Preferred:

Knowledge of direct response marketing and lead funnels.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in video advertising.
If you are passionate about video editing and can create standout video ads, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Questions:

Can you provide a portfolio of your previous video ad work?
What is your experience with direct response marketing and lead funnels?

Hourly Range: $15.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 03:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Edit a video - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to edit lifeguarding videos. The videos are of women swimming, lifeguarding etc. I need the women to be blurred out etc.- you can see exactly what I want from the sample video in the 1st link below.
I have about 30 videos in total and would like them to be edited similar to this video.
Https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/30ja47unwqtz2z7cr0dsv/Extications-edited.mp4?rlkey=o6zlljzm67e7iqylt46igqx1p&st=wid9aw95&dl=0

Here are the 30 videos to be replicated including all animations etc. like the video from the link above. https://1drv.ms/f/c/fc1a1fccb9624d19/QhlNYrnMHxoggPxuAAAAAAAAMy5pL3vEA15yXg

I would like to pay a fixed price of $5 per video. Please message me if this job is something you can do. Thank you!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 30, 2024 03:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial

item.title: Looking For An Experienced YouTube Video Editor For An Anime Channel - Upwork
item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits Including Bonuses and raises depending on performance and work quality!

You’re responsible for creating engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.
Examples:

Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

1. https://www.youtube.com/c/IMOTOChupapiMu%C3%B1ano/videos
2. https://www.youtube.com/@Yeagerists/videos


Requirements:

1.  English expert
2. Professional software
3. 48H Or less turnaround time
4. Willing to work long term and grow with the team
5. Passion and knowledgeable about Anime

(10 Videos For $300)

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Look forward to receiving your work.


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 30, 2024 03:25 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: MYS
